original_text: This was the list of the clans of the sons of Merari, whom Moses and Aaron listed according to the commandment of the Lord by Moses.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 므라리 자손들의 종족 중 계수된 자니라

sentences.original_text: This was the list of the clans of the sons of Merari
according to the commandment of the Lord
